trans-unit.source: Implements the standard console logger that outputs event data to the console window during a build.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o agente de console padrão que transmite dados de evento à janela do console durante um build.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> to apply to the logger.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> ao qual aplicar o agente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> com o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> to apply to the logger.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> ao qual aplicar o agente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> para o agente usar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter" /> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter" /> para o agente usar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter" /> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter" /> para o agente usar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter" />, and <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" /> com os valores <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter" /> e <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The parameter name to add to the logger.
trans-unit.target: O nome do parâmetro a ser adicionado ao agente.

trans-unit.source: The parameter value to assign to the <c>parameterName</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de parâmetro a ser atribuído ao <c>parameterName</c>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified parameter name and value to the logger.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o nome e o valor do parâmetro especificado ao agente.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildFinishedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildFinishedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildFinished" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildFinished" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.CustomBuildEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.CustomBuildEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.CustomEventRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.CustomEventRaised" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the logger for build events.
trans-unit.target: Registra o agente para eventos de build.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> to register with the logger.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> a ser registrado com o agente.

trans-unit.source: Registers the logger for the specified events.
trans-unit.target: Registra o agente dos eventos especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> to register with the logger.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource" /> a ser registrado com o agente.

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes to initialize.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Registers the logger for the specified events.
trans-unit.target: Registra o agente dos eventos especificados.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.MessageRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.MessageRaised" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameters passed to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os parâmetros passados para o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.

trans-unit.source: The parameters passed to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros passados para o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A> method to build a project file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine.BuildProjectFile%2A> para compilar um arquivo de projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger> class is used to log information to a file.
trans-unit.target: A classe <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.FileLogger> é usada para registrar em log as informações em um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectFinishedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectFinishedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectFinished" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectFinished" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o agente exibirá um resumo de erros e avisos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o agente de log exibirá um resumo de erros e avisos; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Stops the logger and releases all resources.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o agente e libera todos os recursos.

trans-unit.source: The default console logger does not need to release any resources.
trans-unit.target: O agente de log de console padrão não precisa liberar quaisquer recursos.

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não faz nada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display messages when new projects are started during the build.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o agente exibirá mensagens quando novos projetos forem iniciados durante o build.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display messages when new projects are started during the build; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para exibir mensagens quando novos projetos são iniciados durante a compilação; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetStartedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetStartedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetStarted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetStarted" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskFinishedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskFinishedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskFinished" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskFinished" />.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskStartedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskStartedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskStarted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskStarted" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> level of the logger.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> do agente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> level of the logger.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity" /> nível do agente de log.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> delegate for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define para o delegado <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> para o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> delegate for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler" /> delegar o <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger" />.
